Math Namespace Reference

Constans (speeds)

Multiplicative constants that should be used when converting between speeds in m/s and km/h.
  • const float64 KMH_TO_MS = 0.2777777777777777
    From km/h to $m/s$.
  • const float64 MS_TO_KMH = 3.6
    From $m/s$ to $km/h$.

Functions

    Find out if a given number is odd or even.

Function Documentation

Find out if a given number is odd or even.

Parameters:
nbr The number to test for oddity.
Returns:
True if the parameters bit 0 is set.
